title: Let Your Feature Flag Fly
description: If you use Twitter, Facebook, or Netflix, chances are that you've encountered feature flags: small, logical operators that control which features are executed and which ones are not.
summary: Gradually deploy your site's features using feature flags.

children.value: If you use Twitter, Facebook, or Netflix, chances are that you've encountered feature flags: small, logical operators that control which features are executed and which ones are not.
In this article, I talk about how feature flags can be used to gradually deploy features to your customers and avoid deployment rollbacks.
